item.description: The Batman Part II will establish a new villain for the series, expanding on the darkness of Gotham, and they could already be connected to Batman.

item.title: Mufasa's White Lions Could Change The Villains Of The Next Lion King Movie
item.description: Mufasa: The Lion King introduced the villainous white lions, and this unique pride could replace the "Outsiders" of The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride.

item.title: 10 Funniest Hulk Scenes In The MCU, Ranked
item.description: The Incredible Hulk might not seems like the funniest character in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, but he has delivered some truly hysterical moments.
